p:
Lopinavir/ritonavir have major interactions with drugs used in cardiovascular diseases such as anti-coagulating agents (anti-factor Xa inhibitors), none dihydropyridine calcium channel blockers, digoxin, antiarrhythmic agents such as amiodarone, etc. So close patient monitoring is required in COVID-19 patients with pre-existing cardiovascular disease who are planned to treat with lopinavir/ritonavir and sometimes alternative drugs might be considered.
